input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard W/ Lobster Clasp Cords for Cellphone/ USB Drive/ Keychain / DIY Jewelry - Hot Pink(Length:2.8", QTY:200X Pcs)

Product keywords:
Charm Straps for Cellphone, USB Drive, Keychain, Name Tag, Trinkets, Decoration for Handmade Jewelry Accessories.
Lightweight and easy to Connect Cords Strap Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp, easy to attach / detach.
Decorate your Mobile Phone / Camera / iPod / Mp3 / Mp4 / USB Flash Drive with the Colorful Fashionable Straps.
Excellent DIY Accessory String Strap Gift.
Package included 200X Pieces of Hot Pink Strap. Item Size: 2.8".

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Looking for a fun and stylish way to keep your phone, USB drive, keychain, or name tag close at hand? Look no further than our Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp! These lightweight and easy-to-use straps are perfect for attaching to any small item you need to keep handy. With their bright hot pink color and trendy design, they're also great for adding a pop of color and personality to your everyday accessories. Plus, they're easy to connect and detach, so you can switch them up as often as you like. Whether you're using them for your own personal accessories or as a fun DIY jewelry-making project, our Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp are sure to be a hit!
input_text.Response B: A great value, this package contains 200 pieces of the Mini-Factory pink strap charm lariat lanyard with a lobster clasp for cellphone, USB drive, keychain, name tag, or trinkets. Ideal for decorating your mobile phone, camera, iPod, mp3, mp4, or USB flash drive, the lightweight and easy to connect cords strap lariat lanyard can be easily attached or detached with the lobster clasp. The attractive, colorful, and fashionable straps are easy to use and can be cut to any desired length. Each strap has a charm at each end. The item size is 2.8".
